ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by the French Government under the ‘Investissements d'avenir’ (Investments for the Future) program managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR, fr: National Agency for Research) (reference: Méditerranée Infection 10-IAHU-03). This work was supported by Région Provence Alpes Côte d'Azur and European funding FEDER PRIMI.

sec.title: Conflict of interest
sec.p: The authors have no conflicts of interest to declare. No funding sources were used in the design and conduct of the study; collection, management, analysis and interpretation of the data and preparation, review or approval of the manuscript.
